participant_1.background:
I have worked at my current job for two years and I am looking forward to moving to a new home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.
i m obsessed with animals.
this summer i went on vacation to italy.
My favorite websites are Healthline and Eat This, Not That! because they provide evidence-based information about nutrition and healthy recipes.
during the week , i work as a barista.

participant_2.background:
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
I work in a fast-paced environment that encourages me to try new things and learn from my mistakes.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hi! I'm doing well thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing great! Thank you. I'm a barista and I just got off work.
Oh nice! I'm a teacher, and I just got home from work.
That sounds like a lot of work! I'm sure you're tired.
Yes, I am a little tired, but I'm happy to be home.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out with friends, read, and watch movies.
That sounds fun! I like to go out with friends too. I also like to play video games and go on hikes.
Oh, I love hiking! I haven't had a chance to go in a while.
You should go! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy nature.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What's your favorite movie?
Oh, that's a tough question. I have a lot of favorites. But I'd have to say my favorite movie is The Princess Bride.
Oh, I love that movie! It's so classic.
I know! It's one of those movies that I can watch over and over again and never get tired of it.
Me too! I love the story and the characters.
Yeah, it's a great movie. I'm glad you like it too.
